contentrichtext.text: '''Queen Elephantine''' is an experimental [[Psychedelic rock]]/[[Doom metal|doom]] [[Heavy metal music|metal]] band from [[New York City]]. The band was formed in [[Hong Kong]] in 2006 by Indrayudh Shome and Danny Quinn but the lineup has changed several times and Shome is the only remaining original member. The band is currently based in [[Providence, Rhode Island]]. They have produced four full length albums, [[Surya (album)|Surya]], [[Kailash (album)|Kailash]], [[Garland of Skulls (album)|Garland of Skulls]], and [[Scarab (album)|Scarab]], three [[Split Album|splits]], with [[Sons of Otis]], [[Elder]], and [[Alunah]], and several minor releases. == Discography == * ''Scarab'' (2013 Heart & Crossbone, CD; Cosmic Eye, LP) * ''Garland of Skulls'' (2011 Concrete Lo Fi, CD) * ''Kailash'' (2010 Concrete Lo Fi, CD; 2009 Abandon Ship, cassette) * ''8XI08 Live in Brooklyn'' (2010 Faunasabbatha, CDr and cassette) * ''Alunah/Queen Elephantine Split'' (2009 Catacomb, 7" vinyl) * ''To Tartarus'' (2008 e-release) * ''Yatra'' (2008 e-release) * ''Surya'' (2008 Concrete Lo Fi, CD) * ''Sons Of Otis/Queen Elephantine Split'' (2007 Concrete Lo Fi, CD) * ''Queen Elephantine/Elder Double EP'' (2006 Concrete Lo Fi, CDr) * ''Queen Elephantine'' (2006 Elephantrader, CDr) == External links == *[http://queenelephantine.clfrecords.com Official Website] [[Category:Musical groups established in 2006]] [[Category:American doom metal musical groups]] [[Category:Heavy metal musical groups from New York]] {{US-metal-band-stub}}
